Text.Value: Info new safety module - PROFIsafe V2.4
Info new safety module - PROFIsafe V2.6
Secure target address (F_Dest_Add) does not match presetting
Secure target address (F_Dest_Add) does not match the set address
Secure target address (F_Dest_Add) is outside of the valid value range
Invalid or error in secure source address (F_Source_Add)
Check the value of the secure source address (F_Source_Add) in the configuration
Check the value of the PROFIsafe watchdog (F_WD_Time) in the configuration
Parameter 'F_SIL' is higher than the SIL of the device
Check the set SIL value in the configuration
Parameter 'F_CRC_Length' is not equal to the generated value
Check the set value for F_CRC_Length in the configuration
Data of the received F-parameter block is invalid (CRC1 error)
Reload the safety program and make sure that you are using an F-PLC
iParameters are not supported by the scanner
Check the F_Block_ID in the configuration
Transmission error: data is invalid (CRC2 error)
Check the transmission quality of the PROFINET network
Check the cycle time of the safety program and the set watchdog time (F_WD_Time)
RSL400P not connected to PROFINET connection unit
Plug an RSL400P into the PROFINET connection unit
The maximum cable length is 100�m for electrical cables and 50�m for optical cables
Error in the PROFINET connection unit
Check the entry in the diagnostics list
Compare the wiring of the PROFINET participants with the configuration
Refer to diagnostic ID Ixxx from the diagnostics list of the scanner in the operating instructions
Refer to diagnostic ID Uxxx from the diagnostics list of the scanner in the operating instructions
Refer to diagnostic ID Exxx from the diagnostics list of the scanner in the operating instructions
Internal error detected, create a service file and contact the Leuze electronic customer service
Refer to diagnostic ID Pxxx from the diagnostics list of the scanner in the operating instructions
Internal temperature of RSL400P is too high
Check whether the RSL400P is operated according to the permissible environmental conditions
Internal temperature of RSL400P is too low
Check whether the RSL400P is operated according to the permissible environmental conditions
Clean the optics cover as soon as possible, sensor is still in safety mode
Clean the optics cover and check the optics cover for damage
Glare from light source or another scanner
Align the RSL400P so that it is not dazzled by any other light source or another scanner
Check the data in the process image
Data for protective field switchover is invalid
Check the data in the process image and the protective field switchovers set in the configuration
Error in the sequence for protective field switchover
Check the data in the process image and the sequence set in the configuration
Warning: remaining life expectancy less than 20%
Please replace the sensors as soon as possible to ensure system availability
